snippet: Instead of repudiating a casino mogul’s billions, Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan get even closer and jeopardize the integrity of their campaign.
abstract: Editorial rebukes Mitt Romney and Paul D Ryan for cultivating relationship with casino tycoon and major Republican donor Sheldon Adelson, whose company is under multiple federal investigations for its improper business practices; asserts that aligning themselves with this allegedly crooked businessman could jeopardize the integrity of their presidential campaign.
lead_paragraph: Instead of repudiating a casino mogul’s billions, Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan get even closer and jeopardize the integrity of their campaign.
